unified_data.title: IBM AI Foundations for Business Specialization
unified_data.description: The IBM AI Foundations for Business Specialization on Coursera provides a comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence concepts and their application in business contexts. Learners will gain insights into AI technologies, machine learning, data science, and how they can be leveraged for data-driven decision-making and strategic advantage.
unified_data.prerequisites: Basic understanding of business principles and familiarity with data concepts. Some exposure to mathematics and statistics is helpful, but not required.
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Understand AI concepts, apply machine learning techniques in business, and make data-driven decisions. Develop strategies for leveraging AI for business advantage and innovation. Gain practical AI skills for various business contexts.
unified_data.price: Coursera subscription required

unified_data.title: AI Foundations for Everyone Specialization
unified_data.description: The AI Foundations for Everyone Specialization provides a broad understanding of Artificial Intelligence (AI) concepts, applications, and impact. Learners will explore fundamental AI technologies like machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing. The specialization covers practical applications across various industries and provides hands-on experience with AI tools and platforms. Also, it will helps learners understand the ethics and societal implications of AI. Finally, by joining the Specialization, you'll develop a foundation for further exploration and implementation of AI solutions.
unified_data.prerequisites: Basic computer literacy and a general interest in technology. No prior programming or AI knowledge is required.
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Understand core AI concepts like machine learning and deep learning. Identify practical AI applications across industries. Evaluate the ethical and societal implications of AI. Develop a foundation for implementing AI solutions.
unified_data.price: Coursera offers a subscription-based model. Check Coursera for current pricing.

original_data.Skills: model interpretation, Image Segmentation, natural language extraction, Machine Learning, time-to-event modeling, Deep Learning, model evaluation, Multi-class classification, Random Forest, model tuning, treatment effect estimation, machine learning interpretation,

unified_data.title: AI for Medicine Specialization
unified_data.description: The AI for Medicine Specialization on Coursera aims to equip learners with the knowledge and skills to apply artificial intelligence techniques to solve real-world problems in healthcare. The program covers a range of topics including machine learning, deep learning, medical image analysis, natural language processing for medical text, and time-to-event modeling. You'll learn to build and evaluate AI models for tasks like disease diagnosis, treatment prediction, and patient risk stratification. Model interpretation and ethical considerations in AI for medicine are also addressed.
unified_data.prerequisites: Basic understanding of Python programming, linear algebra, calculus, and probability. Some familiarity with machine learning concepts is helpful but not required.
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Apply AI techniques to medical data, build and evaluate machine learning models for healthcare applications, and understand the ethical considerations of AI in medicine. You will also have knowledge on model interpretation and treatment effect estimation.
unified_data.price: Coursera offers a subscription-based model for specializations. Check Coursera for current pricing details.

original_data.Title: AI Fundamentals for Non-Data Scientists
original_data.Short Intro: In this course, you will go in-depth to discover how Machine Learning is used to handle and interpret Big Data. You will get a detailed look at the various ways and methods to create algorithms to incorporate into your business with such tools as Teachable Machine and TensorFlow. You will also learn different ML methods, Deep Learning, as well as the limitations but also how to drive accuracy and use the best training data for your algorithms. You will then explore GANs and VAEs, using your newfound knowledge to engage with AutoML to help you start building algorithms that work to suit your needs. You will also see exclusive interviews with industry leaders, who manage Big Data for companies such as McDonald's and Visa. By the end of this course, you will have learned different ways to code, including how to use no-code tools, understand Deep Learning, how to measure and review errors in your algorithms, and how to use Big Data to not only maintain customer privacy but also how to use this data to develop different strategies that will drive your business.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English

unified_data.title: AI Fundamentals for Non-Data Scientists

You will then explore GANs and VAEs, using your newfound knowledge to engage with AutoML to help you start building algorithms that work to suit your needs. You will also see exclusive interviews with industry leaders, who manage Big Data for companies such as McDonald's and Visa. By the end of this course, you will have learned different ways to code, including how to use no-code tools, understand Deep Learning, how to measure and review errors in your algorithms, and how to use Big Data to not only maintain customer privacy but also how to use this data to develop different strategies that will drive your business.
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Understand Machine Learning applications in Big Data, create algorithms using tools like TensorFlow and Teachable Machine, explore Deep Learning, and utilize AutoML to build custom algorithms for business needs.
unified_data.price: Paid (Coursera subscription)

original_data.Title: AI Applications in Marketing and Finance
original_data.Short Intro: In this course, you will learn about AI-powered applications that can enhance the customer journey and extend the customer lifecycle. You will learn how this AI-powered data can enable you to analyze consumer habits and maximize their potential to target your marketing to the right people. You will also learn about fraud, credit risks, and how AI applications can also help you combat the ever-challenging landscape of protecting consumer data. You will also learn methods to utilize supervised and unsupervised machine learning to enhance your fraud detection methods. You will also hear from leading industry experts in the world of data analytics, marketing, and fraud prevention. By the end of this course, you will have a substantial understanding of the role AI and Machine Learning play when it comes to consumer habits, and how we are able to interact and analyze information to increase deep learning potential for your business.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English

unified_data.title: AI Applications in Marketing and Finance

You will also learn methods to utilize supervised and unsupervised machine learning to enhance your fraud detection methods. You will also hear from leading industry experts in the world of data analytics, marketing, and fraud prevention. By the end of this course, you will have a substantial understanding of the role AI and Machine Learning play when it comes to consumer habits, and how we are able to interact and analyze information to increase deep learning potential for your business.

original_data.Title: Deep Neural Networks with PyTorch
original_data.Short Intro: The course will teach you how to develop deep learning models using  Pytorch. The course will start with Pytorch's  tensors and Automatic differentiation package. Then each section will cover different models starting off with fundamentals such as Linear Regression, and logistic/softmax regression. Followed by  Feedforward deep neural networks, the role of different activation functions, normalization and dropout layers. Then Convolutional Neural Networks and Transfer learning will be covered. Finally, several other Deep learning methods will be covered.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: Arabic, French, Portuguese (European), Italian, Vietnamese, German, Russian, English, Spanish

unified_data.title: Deep Neural Networks with PyTorch

Finally, several other Deep learning methods will be covered.

You will also demonstrate AI in action with a mini project.

original_data.Title: Machine Learning Foundations for Product Managers
original_data.Short Intro: In this first course of the AI Product Management Specialization offered by Duke University's Pratt School of Engineering, you will build a foundational understanding of what machine learning is, how it works and when and why it is applied.  To successfully manage an AI team or product and work collaboratively with data scientists, software engineers, and customers you need to understand the basics of machine learning technology.  This course provides a non-coding introduction to machine learning, with focus on the process of developing models, ML model evaluation and interpretation, and the intuition behind common ML and deep learning algorithms.  The course will conclude with a hands-on project in which you will have a chance to train and optimize a machine learning model on a simple real-world problem.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English
original_data.Skills: Data Science,Artificial Neural Network,Machine Learning,Predictive Analytics,Modeling,

unified_data.description: In this first course of the AI Product Management Specialization offered by Duke University's Pratt School of Engineering, you will build a foundational understanding of what machine learning is, how it works and when and why it is applied.  To successfully manage an AI team or product and work collaboratively with data scientists, software engineers, and customers you need to understand the basics of machine learning technology.  This course provides a non-coding introduction to machine learning, with focus on the process of developing models, ML model evaluation and interpretation, and the intuition behind common ML and deep learning algorithms.  The course will conclude with a hands-on project in which you will have a chance to train and optimize a machine learning model on a simple real-world problem.

original_data.Title: AI for Medical Diagnosis
original_data.Short Intro: AI is transforming the practice of medicine. Its helping doctors diagnose patients more accurately, make predictions about patients future health, and recommend better treatments. As an AI practitioner, you have the opportunity to join in this transformation of modern medicine. If you're already familiar with some of the math and coding behind AI algorithms, and are eager to develop your skills further to tackle challenges in the healthcare industry, then this specialization is for you. No prior medical expertise is required!
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: Arabic, French, Portuguese (European), Italian, Vietnamese, German, Russian, English, Spanish
original_data.Skills: Deep Learning,Image Segmentation,Machine Learning,model evaluation,Multi-class classification,

If you're already familiar with some of the math and coding behind AI algorithms, and are eager to develop your skills further to tackle challenges in the healthcare industry, then this specialization is for you. No prior medical expertise is required!

original_data.Title: Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
original_data.Short Intro: In this course you will learn how to quickly and easily get started with Artificial Intelligence using IBM Watson. You will understand how Watson works, become familiar with its use cases and real life client examples, and be introduced to several of Watson AI services from IBM that enable anyone to easily apply AI and build smart apps. You will also work with several Watson services to demonstrate AI in action.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: Arabic, French, Portuguese (European), Italian, Vietnamese, Korean, German, Russian, English, Spanish
original_data.Skills: Deep Learning,Application Programming Interfaces (API),Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,watson,

unified_data.title: Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
unified_data.description: In this course you will learn how to quickly and easily get started with Artificial Intelligence using IBM Watson. You will understand how Watson works, become familiar with its use cases and real life client examples, and be introduced to several of Watson AI services from IBM that enable anyone to easily apply AI and build smart apps. You will also work with several Watson services to demonstrate AI in action.

original_data.Title: Machine Learning Introduction for Everyone
original_data.Short Intro: This three-module course introduces machine learning and data science for everyone with a foundational understanding of machine learning models. Youll learn about the history of machine learning, applications of machine learning, the machine learning model lifecycle, and tools for machine learning. Youll also learn about supervised versus unsupervised learning, classification, regression, evaluating machine learning models, and more. Our labs give you hands-on experience with these machine learning and data science concepts. You will develop concrete machine learning skills as well as create a final project demonstrating your proficiency.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English
original_data.Skills: Deep Learning,Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,Reinforcement Learning,Machine Learning Model Lifecycle,

unified_data.title: Machine Learning Introduction for Everyone
unified_data.description: This three-module course introduces machine learning and data science for everyone with a foundational understanding of machine learning models. Youll learn about the history of machine learning, applications of machine learning, the machine learning model lifecycle, and tools for machine learning. Youll also learn about supervised versus unsupervised learning, classification, regression, evaluating machine learning models, and more. Our labs give you hands-on experience with these machine learning and data science concepts. You will develop concrete machine learning skills as well as create a final project demonstrating your proficiency.

original_data.Title: Introduction to Deep Learning & Neural Networks with Keras
original_data.Short Intro: Looking to start a career in Deep Learning? Look no further. This course will introduce you to the field of deep learning and help you answer many questions that people are asking nowadays, like what is deep learning, and how do deep learning models compare to artificial neural networks? You will learn about the different deep learning models and build your first deep learning model using the Keras library.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: French, Portuguese (European), Russian, English, Spanish
original_data.Skills: Deep Learning,Artificial Neural Network,Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,keras,

unified_data.title: Introduction to Deep Learning & Neural Networks with Keras

You will learn about the different deep learning models and build your first deep learning model using the Keras library.
prerequisites: Understanding of fundamental machine learning concepts (optional)
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Understand deep learning concepts and how they compare to neural networks. Learn about different deep learning models. Build your first deep learning model using the Keras library.

In this beginner-friendly course, you will understand computer vision and learn about its various applications across many industries.

original_data.Title: Technologies and platforms for Artificial Intelligence
original_data.Short Intro: This course will address the hardware technologies for machine and deep learning (from the units of an Internet-of-Things system to a large-scale data centers) and will explore the families of machine and deep learning platforms (libraries and frameworks) for the design and development of smart applications and systems.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English

unified_data.title: Technologies and platforms for Artificial Intelligence
unified_data.description: This course will address the hardware technologies for machine and deep learning (from the units of an Internet-of-Things system to a large-scale data centers) and will explore the families of machine and deep learning platforms (libraries and frameworks) for the design and development of smart applications and systems.

original_data.Title: AI Applications in Marketing and Finance
original_data.Short Intro: In this course, you will learn about AI-powered applications that can enhance the customer journey and extend the customer lifecycle. You will learn how this AI-powered data can enable you to analyze consumer habits and maximize their potential to target your marketing to the right people. You will also learn about fraud, credit risks, and how AI applications can also help you combat the ever-challenging landscape of protecting consumer data. You will also learn methods to utilize supervised and unsupervised machine learning to enhance your fraud detection methods. You will also hear from leading industry experts in the world of data analytics, marketing, and fraud prevention. By the end of this course, you will have a substantial understanding of the role AI and Machine Learning play when it comes to consumer habits, and how we are able to interact and analyze information to increase deep learning potential for your business.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English

original_data.Title: AI Fundamentals for Non-Data Scientists
original_data.Short Intro: In this course, you will go in-depth to discover how Machine Learning is used to handle and interpret Big Data. You will get a detailed look at the various ways and methods to create algorithms to incorporate into your business with such tools as Teachable Machine and TensorFlow. You will also learn different ML methods, Deep Learning, as well as the limitations but also how to drive accuracy and use the best training data for your algorithms. You will then explore GANs and VAEs, using your newfound knowledge to engage with AutoML to help you start building algorithms that work to suit your needs. You will also see exclusive interviews with industry leaders, who manage Big Data for companies such as McDonald's and Visa. By the end of this course, you will have learned different ways to code, including how to use no-code tools, understand Deep Learning, how to measure and review errors in your algorithms, and how to use Big Data to not only maintain customer privacy but also how to use this data to develop different strategies that will drive your business.
original_data.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: English

original_data.Title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI)
original_data.Short Intro: In this course you will learn what Artificial Intelligence (AI) is, explore use cases and applications of AI, understand AI concepts and terms like machine learning, deep learning and neural networks. You will be exposed to various issues and concerns surrounding AI such as ethics and bias, & jobs, and get advice from experts about learning and starting a career in AI.  You will also demonstrate AI in action with a mini project.

unified_data.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI)
unified_data.description: In this course you will learn what Artificial Intelligence (AI) is, explore use cases and applications of AI, understand AI concepts and terms like machine learning, deep learning and neural networks. You will be exposed to various issues and concerns surrounding AI such as ethics and bias, & jobs, and get advice from experts about learning and starting a career in AI.  You will also demonstrate AI in action with a mini project.
unified_data.prerequisites: Basic computer literacy, familiarity with mathematical concepts.
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Understand AI concepts like machine learning and deep learning, explore AI use cases and applications, and analyze ethical issues and career options in AI. Complete a mini-project to demonstrate AI in action.
unified_data.price: Free to audit; certificate available with paid subscription.
